floorArea.title: Floor Area
floorArea.description: Click to outline the floor area on the active storey. Snap to perimeter corners or existing floor edges for precise alignment.

floorOpening.title: Floor Opening
floorOpening.description: Draw an opening within an existing floor area. Use snapping to align with floor edges or other openings.

move.info: Drag entities to move them. After releasing, you can type a number to adjust the movement distance precisely.
move.controlDrag: Click and drag to move entities
move.controlSnap: Movement snaps to grid and geometry
move.controlPrecise: After moving, type numbers for precise distance

perimeterPreset.info: Presets create common building shapes with the reference edge you choose. Switch between inside or outside dimensions and configure construction properties.

splitWall.title: Split Wall
splitWall.info: Split walls to create segments with different wall assemblies or to position openings precisely.
splitWall.selectWall: Click on a wall to select it for splitting
splitWall.controlHover: Hover over wall to preview split position
splitWall.controlMeasurements: Click measurements to enter precise values

testData.resetWarning: ⚠️ This will permanently clear all perimeters, openings, and saved work
testData.instructions: Click any button above to generate test data or reset the model. Each test case creates a perimeter with realistic windows and doors to demonstrate the application features.
testData.confirmReset: Are you sure you want to reset all data? This will clear all perimeters, openings, and saved work.

simplePolygon.controlSnap: Points snap to grid, perimeters, and existing geometry
simplePolygon.controlNumbers: Type numbers to set exact segment lengths

roof.info: Draw the roof outline by clicking to place points. The roof direction will be perpendicular to the first edge.
roof.controlSnap: Points snap to perimeter edges and other geometry

perimeter.infoInside: Draw the {{edge}} of your building perimeter. Click to place points, and close the shape by clicking the first point or pressing Enter.
perimeter.controlSnap: Points snap to grid and existing geometry
perimeter.controlNumbers: Type numbers to set exact wall length

addPost.info: Click on a wall to place a post. Configure dimensions, type, position, and materials before placement.
addPost.noExistingConfigurations: No existing posts found in model

addOpening.info: Click on a wall to place an opening. Configure type, size, position, and assembly before placement.
addOpening.openingAssemblyTooltip: Override the opening assembly for this specific opening. Leave as default to inherit from the wall assembly or global default.
addOpening.noExistingOpenings: No existing openings found in model
